executable.title: Quantitative Indices
executable.description: Calculate quantitative indices for a specified label. Requires grayscale and label images as input.
executable.contributor: Ethan Ulrich (University of Iowa), Andrey Fedorov (SPL), Markus van Tol (University of Iowa), Christian Bauer (University of Iowa), Reinhard Beichel (University of Iowa), John Buatti (University of Iowa)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded in part by Quantitative Imaging to Assess Response in Cancer Therapy Trials NIH grant U01-CA140206 and Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) NIH grant U24 CA180918.

string.name: Software_Version
string.label: Software Version
string.description: Repository version of Quantitative Indices Extension (must run module)

file.name: CSVFile
file.label: CSV Output File
file.description: Output CSV file name that will contain the calculated indices

boolean.name: returnCSV
boolean.label: Output CSV Only
boolean.description: Calculate indices for all labels and return CSV file

integer.name: Label_Value
integer.label: Label Value
integer.description: Label Map value for region to be quantified

boolean.name: Mean
boolean.label: Mean
boolean.description: Mean value in region of interest

boolean.name: SD
boolean.label: Standard Deviation
boolean.description: Standard deviation in region of interest

boolean.name: Min
boolean.label: Min
boolean.description: Minimum value in region of interest

boolean.name: Max
boolean.label: Max
boolean.description: Maximum value in region of interest

boolean.name: RMS
boolean.label: RMS
boolean.description: Root-mean-square value in region of interest

boolean.name: Volume
boolean.label: Volume
boolean.description: Volume of region of interest

boolean.name: First_Quartile
boolean.label: First Quartile
boolean.description: First quartile in region of interest

boolean.name: Median
boolean.label: Median
boolean.description: Median value in region of interest

boolean.name: Third_Quartile
boolean.label: Third Quartile
boolean.description: Third quartile in region of interest

boolean.name: Upper_Adjacent
boolean.label: Upper Adjacent
boolean.description: Upper adjacent value in region of interest

boolean.name: TLG
boolean.label: TLG
boolean.description: Total lesion glycolysis

boolean.name: Glycolysis_Q1
boolean.label: Glycolysis Q1
boolean.description: Lesion glycolysis calculated from 1st quarter of distribution

boolean.description: Lesion glycolysis calculated from 4th quarter of distribution

boolean.label: Q1 Distribution
boolean.description: 1st quarter distribution of range in region of interest

boolean.name: Q2_Distribution
boolean.label: Q2 Distribution
boolean.description: 2nd quarter distribution of range in region of interest

boolean.name: Q3_Distribution
boolean.label: Q3 Distribution
boolean.description: 3rd quarter distribution of range in region of interest

boolean.name: Q4_Distribution
boolean.label: Q4 Distribution
boolean.description: 4th quarter distribution of range in region of interest

boolean.name: SAM
boolean.label: SAM
boolean.description: Standardized added metabolic activity

boolean.name: SAM_Background

boolean.name: Peak

boolean.description: Peak value in region of interest
